definition: Ximending (neighborhood in Wanhua district, Taipei)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
west

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: In Taipei's movie district, the action flicks are always the biggest draws.
sentences.chinese: 臺北西門町的電影街中，動作片的觀衆總是最多。

sentences.english: Shooting a movie in Hsimenting attracts a wave of on- lookers in no time.
sentences.chinese: 在西門町拍電影，馬上引來觀看的人潮。

sentences.english: I am in love with Japan at ximending.
sentences.chinese: 我是在西門町愛上日本的。

sentences.english: Ximending or Taiwanese pop culture center in China.
sentences.chinese: 西門町還是臺灣流行文化的集散地。

sentences.english: I got these shoes AT a favorite shop of mine in Taipei Hsimenting.
sentences.chinese: 我在臺北的西門町一家我最喜歡的店買了這些鞋子。

sentences.english: The name of Ximending was derived from its position outside the west gate of Taipei Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 西門町因爲位於臺北城的西門外，因此得名。

sentences.english: Do you know a place named Ximending? There is a hypermarket near the Ximen MRT station.
sentences.chinese: 您知道西門町嗎？西門捷運站附近有個大賣場。

sentences.english: CHENGDU Starfruit Juice Shop in Ximending, Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 臺北市西門町的成都楊桃冰店。
